LamBox.Empty:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Empty
      constructors:

PatternLambda.Bool:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Bool
      constructors:
        r#false (0 arg(s))
        r#true (0 arg(s))

PatternLambda.case: constant declaration: body: λ _ _ _ → @0 @1

PatternLambda.not:
  constant declaration:
    body: λ _ →
            PatternLambda.case □ @0
              (λ _ _ →
                 case<PatternLambda.Bool{0},0> @0 of
                   λ<[]> PatternLambda.Bool{0}{1}
                   λ<[]> PatternLambda.Bool{0}{0}
                 @0)

PatternLambda.test:
  constant declaration:
    body: PatternLambda.not PatternLambda.Bool{0}{1}
main program: [PatternLambda.test]
